sqlMap.sql: delete from FEEMANAGEREG where BRC = :brc and ACCTNO = :acctno and REPAYTERM = :repayterm

insert into FEEMANAGEREG (BRC, ACCTNO, REPAYTERM, REPAYOWNBDATE, REPAYOWNEDATE, REPAYINTBDATE, REPAYINTEDATE, TERMRETFEE, FEEAMT, NORETFEE, DAYS, CURRENTSTAT, SETTLEFLAG, TERMRETDATE, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2) values (:brc, :acctno, :repayterm, :repayownbdate, :repayownedate, :repayintbdate, :repayintedate, :termretfee, :feeamt, :noretfee, :days, :currentstat, :settleflag, :termretdate, :modifydate, current timestamp, :reserve1, :reserve2)

update FEEMANAGEREG set REPAYOWNBDATE = :repayownbdate, REPAYOWNEDATE = :repayownedate, REPAYINTBDATE = :repayintbdate, REPAYINTEDATE = :repayintedate, TERMRETFEE = :termretfee, FEEAMT = :feeamt, NORETFEE = :noretfee, DAYS = :days, CURRENTSTAT = :currentstat, SETTLEFLAG = :settleflag, TERMRETDATE = :termretdate, MODIFYDATE = :modifydate, MODIFYTIME = current timestamp, RESERVE1 = :reserve1, RESERVE2 = :reserve2 where BRC = :brc and ACCTNO = :acctno and REPAYTERM = :repayterm

select BRC, ACCTNO, REPAYTERM, REPAYOWNBDATE, REPAYOWNEDATE, REPAYINTBDATE, REPAYINTEDATE, TERMRETFEE, FEEAMT, NORETFEE, DAYS, CURRENTSTAT, SETTLEFLAG, TERMRETDATE, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2 from FEEMANAGEREG where BRC = :brc and ACCTNO = :acctno and REPAYTERM = :repayterm
select * from feemanagereg where acctno = :acctno and settleflag = '01' order by REPAYTERM
